<!DOCTYPE html>
      <head>
        <style>
          html, body {
            background: #1d2126;
          }
        </style>
        <script src="//plus.google.com/hangouts/_/api/v1/hangout.js"></script>
        <script>
          gapi.hangout.onApiReady.add(function(eventObj) {
            var teamworkUrl = gadgets.views.getParams()["appData"];
            var name = gapi.hangout.getLocalParticipant().person.displayName;
            var hangoutUrl = gapi.hangout.getHangoutUrl();
            function navigate() {
              var src = teamworkUrl;
              window.location = encodeURI(src);
            }
            if (teamworkUrl != undefined) {
              gapi.hangout.data.setValue('teamworkUrl', teamworkUrl);
            }
            var interval = setInterval(function() {
              teamworkUrl = gapi.hangout.data.getValue('teamworkUrl');
              console.log(">>>>>>>>>>",teamworkUrl);
              if (teamworkUrl != undefined) {
                clearInterval(interval);
                navigate();
              }
            }, 50);

          });
        </script>
      </head>

      <body></body>
    </html>
